content:
oration? I believe combining your land acquisition strategy and wastewater technology with our SIP construction capabilities could create a powerful model for affordable housing development in flood-prone areas.

I've attached our Serenity Village Development Model presentation that shows our complete approach to resilient, affordable housing development.

Looking forward to hearing from you and reviewing the materials you mentioned sending.

Best regards,Michael Hoffman 

P.S. I've also attached a satellite image of the Lee Street area showing the undeveloped land to the north - it looks like an ideal location for your elevated housing concept.




Michael Hoffman - North Star Group, Inc.  - 19901 Quail Circle - Fairhope, AL 36532 - https://nsgia.com - <redacted.email> - <redacted.phone>
